articles.description: Wilfried Zaha struggled to settle into life away from home and admitted to watching TV by himself and eating croissants for dinner as he dwelled in his on negative thoughts during his time at United.
articles.content:
Wilfried Zaha claims he was 'forgotten about' at Manchester United as he explains how his 'depressing' spell under David Moyes was made worse by not playing. 
The winger who moved to United in 2013 … [+3337 chars]

articles.author: Kieran Jackson
articles.title: Lionel Messi to PSG: Mauricio Pochettino reveals no discussions took place after Barcelona win - Daily Mail
articles.description: With Messi's contract at Barca expiring this year, PSG are the frontrunners for his signature but fellow Argentine Pochettino insists no conversation about his future took place at the Nou Camp.
articles.content:
PSG boss Mauricio Pochettino says no discussions took place with Lionel Messi in the aftermath of the French side's win at Barcelona on Tuesday evening. 
Pochettino's side came back from a goal down… [+1862 chars]

articles.author: Connor Dunn
articles.title: Snubbed transfers led Liverpool to sign their most hated player - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool signed El Hadji Diouf in 2002. But Connor Dunn explains things could have been very different.....
articles.content:
It's difficult to think of a former Liverpool player hated quite so much as El Hadji Diouf, by everyone from legends of the game to fans and all those in between.
